description:
A call to associate_floating_ip results in two calls to update_instance_cache_with_nw_info. One when the decorator is called:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/network/api.py#L232

another when the operation is complete:

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/network/api.py#L255

It looks like the right course of action is to remove the decorator.
title: Double call of update_instance_cache_with_nw_info

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~geekinutah

comments.content: The problem is they are needing to update the instance cache of a different instance. If the assignment operation pulls the floating IP from another instance, they will have to make a call to update the original instances cache and also the new instances cache. Its a double operation but I'm not sure of a better way to do it at the moment.
